vsParam:
OK, let me try the neutralizer here.
It should be strong enough...

Ah, Marie, you are self-studying again.
What are you learning today?
Bombs are essential partners for alchemists.
Why would you study such a dangerous thing...

That's right, alchemists must have bombs!
The two are closely associated with each other in people's minds!

Uh, [px], you should know that, right?
Bombs are a necessity for alchemists.

When I was making "bringing smiles to the world"...
I found that the same recipe would give different effects.

So I want to see what's the difference
between Salburg and Bressisle's bombs.

I see. Indeed, it will be bad
if the bomb goes off wrongly.

[px], how about you make some
bombs for Marie?

Ah! That would be wonderful!
Um... Can you help me?

No problem, you can count on [px]!
[px] will make you some powerful bombs!

Wait. Do they need to be that powerful?
[px], don't go too far, OK?
